mapper.select: select pk_aid, name, age, sex, img, idcard, native place, politics status, tel, eMail, education, university, major, linkmanname, linkmantel, linkmanRelation from d_PersonnelManagementSystem.t_employee_archives where pk_aid = #{pkAid}

select pk_aid, name, age, sex, img, idcard, native place, politics status, tel, eMail, education, university, major, linkmanname, linkmantel, linkmanRelation from d_PersonnelManagementSystem.t_employee_archives limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into d_PersonnelManagementSystem.t_employee_archives(name, age, sex, img, idcard, native place, politics status, tel, eMail, education, university, major, linkmanname, linkmantel, linkmanRelation) values (#{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{img}, #{idcard}, #{native place}, #{politics status}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{education}, #{university}, #{major}, #{linkmanname}, #{linkmantel}, #{linkmanrelation})
mapper.update:
update d_PersonnelManagementSystem.t_employee_archives
name = #{name},
age = #{age},
sex = #{sex},
img = #{img},
idcard = #{idcard},
native place = #{native place},
politics status = #{politics status},
tel = #{tel},
eMail = #{email},
education = #{education},
university = #{university},
major = #{major},
linkmanname = #{linkmanname},
linkmantel = #{linkmantel},
linkmanRelation = #{linkmanrelation},
where pk_aid = #{pkAid}
